channel.title: Bitcoin for sponsored servers?
channel.description: Would anyone be interested in paying for sponsored servers with bitcoins? It doesn't look like it'd be too hard to get this working, but I don't want to go to the effort if no one is interested?

item.title: Bitcoin for sponsored servers?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:550342”][quote author=Spades link=topic=669252.msg4475918#msg4475918 date=1425914438]

The coding is done, anyone will now be able to securely pay for a sponsored server position with bitcoins, and everything is automated with regard to recording payment and posting servers as well.

I haven’t had a chance to look at it yet, but does it automatically convert the bitcoin value into USD?
[/quote]

Yes it does, based on the current exchange rate at https://www.coinbase.com/, updated every 10 minutes.

So bidding and winning etc will still be based on the same USD value it always has, but when you go to pay it’ll convert USD to BTC for you.

I’ll be posting the code I used to do this type of thing open source in the next few days after I see if there are any bugs to work out, but I tested it pretty heavily with testnet so I hope there aren’t any. :)[/quote]
Alright, sounds good. I look forward to seeing this more. I like that more places are taking advantage of Bitcoin.
